https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/oEKv9zlCO5P23QIlQjFL9yMTzZy.jpg Timeless tale of Beauty and the Beast set in the period of the Vikings. Freya, a warrior and the beautiful daughter of a Viking king, is held prisoner on an island castle by a Beast whom has been cursed by his god Odin. Blood of Beasts
